title: Chicken Marsala
methods: Dredge chicken breasts in flour, then brown in olive oil.
Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
Saut√© mushrooms and shallots in the same pan.
Add Marsala wine to deglaze the pan, scraping up any browned bits.
Return chicken to the pan and simmer in the sauce until cooked through.
description: A classic Italian-American dish with a rich, flavorful sauce.
